content: an easy fast free no-sew two-page pattern good for stash busting your worsted-weight yarns looks good in neon brights and nude tones pattern includes two variations pictured a larger more defined and obviously phallic cozy b smaller more subtle cozy finished length 3 inches 8 cm materials needed * e/3 5 mm or f/3 75 mm crochet hook * worsted weight yarn in color of your choice * optional key ring and jump ring you will need to know how to * single_crochet * single_crochet increase * magic loop * double_crochet * slip_stitch * invisible fasten_off * crochet in front loops only * crochet in back loops only * back post single_crochet
